column2: ENGLISH

With the passing of [former_viceroy.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], [From.GetFirstName] has inherited the [viceroy_title.GetFullName]. Under the laws of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], [From.GetSheHe] may only retain the [viceroy_title.GetTier] with your assent.

News has reached [Root.Capital.GetName] that [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] has taken the [viceroy_title.GetFullName] by force, and thus rules without imperial assent. You could grant [From.GetHerHim] that right, or your could deny [From.GetHerHim] victory...though doing so may mean rebellion.
[From.GetSheHeCap] may keep the title
No, [From.GetSheHe] may not hold the [viceroy_title.GetTier]

To my loyal subject,
I hereby grant imperial assent for you to hold the [viceroy_title.GetFullName]. Rule over it wisely, in my name and in the best interests of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
My thanks to the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]

To my loyal subject,
I am afraid I must inform you that I cannot provide imperial assent for you to hold the [viceroy_title.GetFullName]. My councilors will determine who in the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] is best suited to become [viceroy_title.GetRulerTitle].

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
Accept [From.GetHerHis] decision
Offer [From.GetHerHim] a favor
Call in my favor
Offer [From.GetHerHim] a gift
[From.GetSheHeCap] can take the title from my cold, dead hands!

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I hope there is a way I might retain rulership over the [viceroy_title.GetFullName], but I bow to your wisdom.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I acknowledge that you have every right to deny me the [viceroy_title.GetFullName], but I hope that you will see the wisdom in reversing your decision. I am not without resources, after all, and would consider it a personal favor -- one you might have use of in the future.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
I will change my mind for a favor
I have no need of a favor from [From.GetHerHim]

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You are wiser than I supposed, and your offer of a favor in exchange for your retention of the [viceroy_title.GetFullName] is hereby accepted.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have no need of a favor from you. Either think of something better to offer, or accept my decision with a modicum of grace.

[From.GetBestName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
While I acknowledge your right to deny me the [viceroy_title.GetFullName], I am forced to remind you of the favor you owe me. I hereby call it in, in exchange for the right to continue to hold the title.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA],
I acknowledge that you have every right to deny me the [viceroy_title.GetFullName], but I hope that you will see the wisdom in reversing your decision. I am a [From.GetManWoman] with resources, resources that I am more than willing to share with a benevolent liege.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
Accept [From.GetHerHis] generous offer
I will not be bribed like a common bureaucrat

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
You are wiser than I had supposed, and your offer of a gift in exchange for your retention of the [viceroy_title.GetFullName] is hereby accepted.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I find your attempt at a bribe, like a was a common bureaucrat in need of having [From.GetHerHis] palm greased, to be insulting. If you have nothing more to say, than accept my decision with whatever grace you have left.

[From.GetBestName]

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I will not have my titles ripped from me without a fight. I shall see you on the battlefield.

[From.GetBestName]

Your council deliberates for long hours before returning to you with their reluctant verdict: [current_viceroy.GetFirstName] is the only candidate they can agree on who is qualified to hold the [viceroy_title.GetFullName], and they suggest you reverse your decision and grant [current_viceroy.GetHerHim] the title.
Your council deliberates for long hours before returning to you with the name of the one [council_first_pick.GetManWoman] they feel is best suited to hold the [viceroy_title.GetFullName].
Your council deliberates for long hours before returning to you with the names of those they feel are most suited to hold the [viceroy_title.GetFullName]. It is not a long list.
I suppose I have no option but to accept
[current_viceroy.GetFirstName] shall keep the title after all
I choose [council_first_pick.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
I choose [council_second_pick.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
I choose [council_third_pick.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]
I will decide for myself who gets the title

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
After no small amount of deliberation, my council and I have decided it is best if you keep the [viceroy_title.GetFullName] after all. Congratulations!

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
I am most relieved to hear it

To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
After no small amount of deliberation, my council and I have decided that you are best suited to administer to the [viceroy_title.GetFullName] on behalf of myself and the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. This is an additional responsibility that I know you will approach with wisdom.

Sincerely,
[From.GetBestName]
Your Favor will be called in to reverse [This.GetHerHis] decision
Your council will propose a replacement to hold the [viceroy_title.GetFullName]
[This.GetTitledName] is informed of your decision
[This.GetTitledName] is offered a bribe in exchange for reversing [This.GetHerHis] decision
[This.GetTitledName] is offered a Favor in exchange for reversing [This.GetHerHis] decision
[This.GetTitledName] reacts to potential loss of the title
